text: СССР (Союз Советских Социалистических Республик) is a Russian abbreviation for the Soviet Union or Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR). CCCP may also refer to: *C.C.C.P. (band), a German synthpop group *CCCP Fedeli alla linea, an Italian band formed in 1982 *Combined Community Codec Pack, a software pack for Microsoft Windows to play multimedia content Drug Chemicals: *Carbonyl cyanide m-chlorophenyl hydrazone, a toxic ionophore and decoupler of the respiratory chain *3C-P ==See also== * USSR (disambiguation) *Soviet Union (disambiguation), including Sovetsky Soyuz
title: CCCP (disambiguation)
